pr_title: Refresh token support for OAuth/OIDC public clients

timeline.message:
Refresh token support for OAuth/OIDC public clients.

* Add OAuth20RefreshToken Authenticator for OAuth/OIDC public clients 
only.

* Removed public clients support in the OAuth20ClientIDClientSecret 
Authenticator.

* Add tests for the new OAuth20RefreshToken Authenticator.

* Add test for the existing OAuth20ClientIdClientSecret Authenticator.
